text: The Gay Sisters is a 1942 American romantic drama movies directed by Irving Rapper and was based on the novel by Stephen Longstreet. It stars Barbara Stanwyck, George Brent, Geraldine Fitzgerald, Donald Crisp, Gig Young, Nancy Coleman, Donald Woods, Larry Simms and was distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1942 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Irving Rapper Category:Movies set in New York City
title: The Gay Sisters
